favourite.article: （七）必有恩典，必有慈愛，一生一世， 隨我不怠，我卻住在，神的殿中， 直到萬代永世無終。
This song tells my heart, I feel the exact same way about Lord Jesus. He is my beloved Shepherd, He is everything I need. I feel blessed and happy. Thank You, Lord Jesus.

This morning when I was on the floor enjoying the moment with our Lord which has not been done in a while, my heart was touched my eye full of tears and love towards Him. This hymn flows up my mind. He is my beloved Shepherd. When I am lost He comes to lead, when I am being defeated, He is there I am not afraid but proclaim my victory. But all is for His name. I thank the Lord, He is so loving, faithful in His shepherding work. Lord, make me the same as You that I can also be there with the weak ones. Lord, duplicate me to be Your faithful servant.
One of my favorite songs from young.
